meanings.sent1: The carpenter crafted a beautiful table from nutwoods.
meanings.sent2: The nutwoods were used to build sturdy furniture in the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns in the nutwoods, thinking they were safe.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the nutwoods filled the room, bringing a sense of warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the nutwoods, one could hear the rustling of leaves and chirping of birds.

meanings.definition: Forests or areas dominated by nut-bearing trees.
meanings.sent1: The hiker explored the dense nutwoods, marveling at the variety of trees.
meanings.sent2: Many animals find shelter and food in the nutwoods throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the nutwoods, their laughter echoing through the trees.
meanings.sent4: The nutwoods stood tall and proud, a testament to the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent5: In the nutwoods, the sunlight filtered through the leaves, creating a magical atmosphere.
